    • handleColourChoosing

      public void handleColourChoosing(String username, PawnColour chosenColour, int toDiscard, boolean toExclude)
      Method to handle the choice of a colour
      Parameters:
      username - current player
      chosenColour - chosen colour
      toDiscard - value of the colour to discard
      toExclude - if true, it exclude the colour from influence

    • handleIsleChoosing

      public void handleIsleChoosing(String username, int chosenIsle, boolean calculateInfluence, boolean setBan)
      Method to handle the choice of an isle
      Parameters:
      username - current player
      chosenIsle - chosen isle
      calculateInfluence - if true, its influence will be calculated
      setBan - if true, it sets a ban on the isle

    • moveStudentsFromCard

      public void moveStudentsFromCard(String username, int characterId, MovementDestination destination, Map<PawnColour,Integer> movedStudents, int isleIndex)
      Method to handle moving a student from a a card
      Parameters:
      username - current player
      characterId - chosen character card id
      destination - destination of the students
      movedStudents - map of the students to move
      isleIndex - if destination is isle, move students to isle with this index

    • handleStudentExchange

      public void handleStudentExchange(String username, int characterId, MovementDestination from, MovementDestination to, Map<PawnColour,Integer> fromMap, Map<PawnColour,Integer> toMap)
      Method to handle student exchange
      Parameters:
      username - current player
      characterId - chosen character card id
      from - where to take the students from
      to - where to put the students on
      fromMap - map to exchange the students from
      toMap - map to exchange the students to
